0.1.name: wordpress/pretio-rewards
0.1.description:
Pretio is the first and only rewards & loyalty plugin that offers publishers the ability to increase and monetize user activity. Immediately after installation, your site has its own rewards section in the form of a side tab or a bottom toolbar. Your rewards catalog is automatically filled by Pretio with valuable, real world rewards such as gift cards and exclusive coupons from top brands. And each time your users redeem points for rewards, you get paid – as much as $4 per redemption!

Once Pretio is activated on your site, users automatically earn points – no sign up required – for valuable actions that you decide. Whether it’s social sharing, visiting, commenting, or liking, Pretio incentivizes your users to visit more frequently, engage more deeply and spread the word to their friends.

Key features for your readers:

  • Users redeem their points for quality, sponsored rewards (gift card & high value co
